discord._comment: Below is for users that want to have a role removed upon verification, if you want this, set remove-role to true, and set your remove role ID.

By default, rules are set to disabled, this means rules will be hidden. If you want to use the rules function, change disabled to your rules. Please ensure you use 
 for each line break and do not use any symbols that could interfear with JSON.
discord.rules:
Type your rules here if rulesenabled is enabled, ensure to use 
 for new lines
